column5: I got it as well
Ah rats.  I thought this was true love for real....I guess this explains why she never replied to my e-mail I sent her.  So sad.  Women, always out to mess with my head....lol.
I never knew OFC had a Call Girl.  I wonder what the Girls Call Guy is like lol
It's Roy. And he is VERY popular.

YES score..... I checked my pm and I am one of the lucky good lookin lads that Mercy wants as her love slave. She has a friend who lives in Nigeria and wants me to help him also by cashing a few money orders and sending him 25% and guess what guys I get to keep the other 75%  So so long you bunch of chumps I am going to be livin the good life soon...........    Art

Just got this in my pms:  Hello My name is Mercy i saw your profile today at ofncommunity and becameintrested in you,i will also like to know you the more, and i want you to send anemail to my email address so i can give you my picture for you to know whom i am.Here is my email address ([email protected]) I believe we can move from here! I am waiting for your mail to my email address above.Mercy (Remeber the distance or colour does not matter but love matters alotin life.([email protected]).   Any ideas as to the best way to mess with this person? I was thinking set up a new anonymous email and then waste their time.
I got these the other day as well.  Sexy single russian brides I think. Email is full of them lately.

We are aware of the PM's. Just ignore them. The accounts have been removed. Let us know if you get any in the future. It is just part of an email harvest attempt. Don't send the person an email unless you enjoy a few thousand spam emails a day. Thanks for letting us know and we are taking steps to try and prevent it from happening again.
No worries here Rick. I long ago realized the limits of my attractiveness, both physically and financially to the opposite sex.
You and me both....lol.
Right. Either that or a Pornado.
Or an easy way to make 20 million dollars from the widow of Dr Sumbuddy.

You mean this is a hoax?  This girl was lying to me? She didnt mean anything she said to me?  Damn I thought somebody was looking through some old posts and stumbled upon me and realized I was a great fisherman and wanted to get to know me.  Thanks for ruining my day.  I thought I would be fishing in Russia next month....

If you guys are going to talk about her at least call her by name (Martina) she is a very sweet innocent girl who is just looking for a nice strong fisherman to take care of her, she tells me thats why see contacted ME! I have sent her money to cover her airfare to TO (she said she wll repay once she lands) I am going to pick her up on Thurs and she has offered to clean house for me just until she gets on her feet. Then we will take it from there. I am planning to take her to meet my parents on Friday. Do you guys think that is to soon?  If anyone would like, I can forward you some of her pics, of course only a few as some of them were for my eyes only (she said so)!   Actually Rick, I received her e-mail at 3:17 PM today. When did you cancel the account?
Yep, I just got the message too !
DANG!!!! I got the same message.....Got kinda curious but the wife saw me and put a halt to that! So it's not legit? OH well...

So I guess the PM I just sent to Chris was a waste of time and you all had her first well next time I wont send this to Chris.  My message title to him  I LOVE THE NEW OFC  Hey Chris I did not even know about the new feature on OFC it sure is amazing that I have found new true love LOL.  I had to laugh just now as I got this PM from "maceylove"  Hello My name is Mercy i saw your profile today at ofncommunity and becameintrested in you,i will also like to know you the more, and i want you to send anemail to my email address so i can give you my picture for you to know whom i am.Here is my email address ([email protected]) I believe we can move from here! I am waiting for your mail to my email address above.Mercy (Remeber the distance or colour does not matter but love matters alotin life.([email protected]).  I thought I would just give ya a heads up about her or him or who ever they are sending there spam I wish I had the balls to send a email and see what I get back but I dont know how to get rid of computer crabs LOL.   Thanks alot Mike

judging by the number of persons that got this message, I guess i'm not special!!!  Oh well, I showed it to my better half, and told her that someone wants me,  Hope that works and she appreciates me more
And I thought I was special!
LOL!!!!  What woman in her right mind goes after fisherman.  We take off with our buddys every chance we get only to come back days later smelling like camp fire, booze and fish.
But we don't come back smelling like an other woman.
So I don't have a great uncle in Africa who won the lottery and left it all to me when he died? I guess I shouldn't of sent that western union check for 2 large!!! lol j/k.

I took my wife out this summer to the lodge I usually go to with my buddys. Wake up in the morning, head down to the dock and of course there is 6 young girls laying on the dock in thier bikinis.  Whats the luck....
Geez, how does that make those of us that didn't get the message feel.  Not even wanted by a fake russian bride spammer.  Ouch.
Well I guess she had the hots in the NICKEL i caught last week cause I did receive it LOL LOL LOL
She just wants a taste of that hot French blood they always hear about..
I guess 'Mercy' aint too particular. Even I got the PM, an old phart like me !!!!
You forgot to insert the word stankin' in front of "old fart Jack"!
Got past the "stanking" age, a loooooong time ago Glen!
I started to laugh
